name: World of Warcraft: Cataclysm
description: Use this installer to play the apollo version (since there is no longer a way to play the game in battle.net)
notes: If this is your first time using Lutris, you should probably take a look at: https://github.com/lutris/lutris/wiki/Installing-drivers (install your video drivers [most linux distros come with the latest AMD drivers right away]) https://github.com/lutris/lutris/wiki/Game:-Blizzard-App (install the dependencies just in case) https://github.com/lutris/lutris/wiki/How-to:-Esync (another thing to do, just in case [most linux distros have it already set up]) https://github.com/lutris/lutris/wiki/Game:-World-of-Warcraft (some info)

files.zipped_files: N/A:Select the .zip World of Warcraft file

content:
files:
- zipped_files: N/A:Select the .zip World of Warcraft file
game:
  exe: drive_c/wow-cataclysm/Wow.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    description: (1/2) Creating wine prefix prefix...
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    description: (2/2) Extracting the game files...
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/wow-cataclysm
    file: zipped_files
    format: zip
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
